#### Contents of `dist\`
##### Plugins
* [Hashes.WDX](http://github.com/meisl/tc_java-NG/blob/master/dist/Hashes.WDX.zip?raw=true) computes various hashes (CRC, MD5, SHA, ...) and stores them in NTFS Alternate Data Streams so that they need not be recomputed if the file didn't change 
* [NtfsStreamsJ.WDX](http://github.com/meisl/tc_java-NG/blob/master/dist/NtfsStreamsJ.WDX.zip?raw=true) TODO: (description.txt missing from plugin folder)
